com.google.android.exoplayer.hls

Class HlsExtractorWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.hls.HlsExtractorWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtractorOutput

    public final class HlsExtractorWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExtractorOutput
    Wraps a Extractor, adding functionality to enable reading of the extracted samples.

        public long getLargestParsedTimestampUs()
        Gets the largest timestamp of any sample parsed by the extractor.
        Returns:
        The largest timestamp, or Long.MIN_VALUE if no samples have been parsed.

      • configureSpliceTo

        public final void configureSpliceTo(HlsExtractorWrapper nextExtractor)
        Attempts to configure a splice from this extractor to the next.

        The splice is performed such that for each track the samples read from the next extractor start with a keyframe, and continue from where the samples read from this extractor finish. A successful splice may discard samples from either or both extractors.

        Splice configuration may fail if the next extractor is not yet in a state that allows the splice to be performed. Calling this method is a noop if the splice has already been configured. Hence this method should be called repeatedly during the window within which a splice can be performed.

        This method must only be called after the extractor has been prepared.

        Parameters:
        nextExtractor - The extractor being spliced to.

      • getTrackCount

        public int getTrackCount()
        Gets the number of available tracks.

        This method must only be called after the extractor has been prepared.

        Returns:
        The number of available tracks.

      • getMediaFormat

        public MediaFormat getMediaFormat(int track)
        Gets the MediaFormat of the specified track.

        This method must only be called after the extractor has been prepared.

        Parameters:

      • getSample

        public boolean getSample(int track,
                         SampleHolder holder)
        Gets the next sample for the specified track.

        This method must only be called after the extractor has been prepared.

        Parameters:
        track - The track from which to read.
        holder - A SampleHolder into which the sample should be read.
        Returns:
        True if a sample was read. False otherwise.

      • discardUntil

        public void discardUntil(int track,
                         long timeUs)
        Discards samples for the specified track up to the specified time.

        This method must only be called after the extractor has been prepared.

        Parameters:
        track - The track from which samples should be discarded.
        timeUs - The time up to which samples should be discarded, in microseconds.

      • hasSamples

        public boolean hasSamples(int track)
        Whether samples are available for reading from getSample(int, SampleHolder) for the specified track.

        This method must only be called after the extractor has been prepared.

        Returns:
        True if samples are available for reading from getSample(int, SampleHolder) for the specified track. False otherwise.

      • read

        public int read(ExtractorInput input)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Reads from the provided ExtractorInput.
        Parameters:
        input - The ExtractorInput from which to read.
        Returns:
        One of Extractor.RESULT_CONTINUE and Extractor.RESULT_END_OF_INPUT.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred reading from the source.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted.

      • track

        public TrackOutput track(int id)
        Description copied from interface: ExtractorOutput
        Invoked when the Extractor identifies the existence of a track in the stream.

        Returns a TrackOutput that will receive track level data belonging to the track.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
